messages.subject: Shinsengumi Menu Complete
messages.msgSnippet: Okay...we already have the Kondo + Hijikata beer Now we need a main dish: Insert the link below into http://babelfish.altavista.com
messages.messageBody:
Okay...we already have the Kondo + Hijikata beer

Now we need a main dish:
Insert the link below into http://babelfish.altavista.com
http://www.katch.ne.jp/~o-4093/menyu.htm
all our favorite persons and ingredients are on the menu ;P

How about dessert?
Cake...insert your favorite cake and decorate with:
http://www.furuta.co.jp/products/candytoys/rekishi/index.htm#03
yes, Saitou is now a cake decoration...
furuta.co.jp is a confectionary company of some sort...but I'm not
sure if the decorations are edible

Now that you've stuffed yourself how about finishing the day with a
nice warm bath with Shinsengumi bath salts...
http://www.aestheticism.com/visitors/editor/kitty/kyotophotojournal/
